name: Space Schmup Coop
description:
Keybinds

  • Movement: WASD or Arrows
  • Fire: Space or Left Control
  • Mute: M
  • Go back to menu: Escape

Up to 4 players (Windows version!, HTML5 version is singleplayer only!)

Survive the onslaught of enemies, evade asteroids and beat The Quad Destructor!

Port to host (UPD and TCP): 27666  (In future versions we will allow players to set port number manually)

This was an experiment between me and a friend to see if we were able to finish a game together for once. Since we were two, and we both love coop games, we decided to make this game playable via online-coop. So I hope you like it and I hope this is not our last game!

Credits:
